Script interface for the Noise Module.The Noise Module allows you to apply turbulence to the movement of your particles. Use the low quality settings to create computationally efficient Noise, or simulate smoother, richer Noise with the higher quality settings. You can also choose to define the behavior of the Noise individually for each axis.

Is the particle system currently emitting particles? A particle system may stop emitting when its emission module has finished, it has been paused or if the system has been stopped using Stop with the StopEmitting flag. Resume emitting by calling Play.

If set to true, the particle system will automatically start playing on startup.

Playback position in seconds.

The duration of the particle system in seconds (Read Only).
Modify the pivot point used for rotating particles.
The playback speed of the particle system. 1 is normal playback speed.

The current number of particles (Read Only).
Biases particle system sorting amongst other transparencies.
Clamp the minimum particle size.
When set to false, the particle system will not emit particles.
Clamp the maximum particle size.
The rate of emission.
Mesh used as particle instead of billboarded texture.
The initial speed of particles when emitted. When using curves, this values acts as a scale on the curve.
The initial size of particles when emitted. When using curves, this values acts as a scale on the curve.
The number of meshes being used for particle rendering.
Set the material used by the Trail module for attaching trails to particles.
The initial color of particles when emitted.
The number of currently active custom vertex streams.
The initial rotation of particles when emitted. When using curves, this values acts as a scale on the curve.
The initial 3D rotation of particles when emitted. When using curves, this values acts as a scale on the curves.
Specifies how the Particle System Renderer interacts with SpriteMask.
The total lifetime in seconds that particles will have when emitted. When using curves, this values acts as a scale on the curve. This value is set in the particle when it is created by the particle system.
Get the array of meshes to be used as particles.
Scale being applied to the gravity defined by Physics.gravity.
Set an array of meshes to be used as particles when the ParticleSystemRenderer.renderMode is set to ParticleSystemRenderMode.Mesh.
Set an array of meshes to be used as particles when the ParticleSystemRenderer.renderMode is set to ParticleSystemRenderMode.Mesh.
The maximum number of particles to emit.
